name: Scotty
text:
Scotty
Scotty was a biker and friend of Joey Paulson.
Biography
On the evening of February 24, 1989, Scotty was enjoying the performance at the Roadhouse when his friend, Joey Paulson, alerted him to the presence of Bobby Briggs and Mike Nelson. Scotty responded, "Oh, what a wonderful world."
Behind the Scenes
Scotty was played by actor and model Rodney Harvey.
Scotty is listed in the credits as "Biker Scotty."
